name: Mega Space Brawl!
description:
• Developer: Joseph Erceg (monochromocat) based in Auckland, New Zealand
  • Release Date: Released!
  • Platforms: PC only
  • Website: https://monochromocat.itch.io/mega-space-brawl
  • Price: Free!
  • File size: 21 Mb
  • Contact: JosephErceg@live.com

Mega Space Brawl! Is an Action Platformer created by..well, me! In 16 weeks, it was Created at Media Design school for the BCT course. Also my first game ever!

You play as Skye who brawls her way through 15 levels of pure danger, with 3 different level types using pretty sweet robot gloves to punch everything in sight!

Features!

  • Robots
  • Punching
  • Jumping
  • Graphics
  • Sound
  • DODGING
  • Free!
  • TANKS
